class_notes: This section is for BSN traditional semester 1 students only.
course_description: This course focuses on concepts of pathophysiology, how disrupting normal structures and functions of the human body leads to disease processes. Students will translate their understanding of pathophysiology to clinical decision making for health promotion, risk reduction and disease management.
sections: Class Nbr: 3623, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1:30-2:45p, Instructor: Landerfelt/Stephens, Status: Open
